name: Bug Massacre
description:
In this shoot 'em up arcade game, you play as a spider who attempts to save the world from the Bugs. The evil bugs have invaded your home and are attempting to destroy your precious eggs. Collect as many as you can and save them from the evil onslaught! If you hate bugs and enjoy shooting things, this is the game for you!

*Controls are included on the title screen

Special thanks to Rubi Nunez for the Idea, Zade Dardari for the music, and freesound.org for the majority of the sound effects. 

https://soundcloud.com/user-183798420
